snippet: Talking Dead," a talk show centered around AMC's hit horror series "The Walking Dead," has been renewed for 16 episodes, as has "Comic Book Men," a reality series set in Jay and Silent Bob's Secret Stash, the Red Bank, N.J., comic-book store owned by...
abstract: Talking Dead," a talk show centered around AMC's hit horror series "The Walking Dead," has been renewed for 16 episodes, as has "Comic Book Men," a reality series set in Jay and Silent Bob's Secret Stash, the Red Bank, N.J., comic-book store owned by the filmmaker Kevin Smith.

headline.main: AMC Renews 'Talking Dead' and 'Comic Book Men'
